root.name: Totems
root.description: Official website of Totems: http://planet-totems.net/News from planet-totems.net has announced that 10tacle Studios Belgium has closed.The future of Totems is unknown.Here is a 360 view of a screenshot: http://planet-totems.net/Gallery/images/Totems realtime 360 screen.mov
